title: Christmas 2020 - Gifts of the Dad Guys

itunes:subtitle: A little bonus scene for the holidays as the dads get into the Christmas spirit! Thanks for listening to Dungeons and Daddies and we'll see you next year!This episode contains profanity and references to alcohol
description:
A little bonus scene for the holidays as the dads get into the Christmas spirit! Thanks for listening to Dungeons and Daddies and we'll see you next year!
